name: Going Macbeth
description:
This is a video game that has been developed by Outerfry for a high school project and developed in 15 hours. This is a game where you fight through many different types of enemies with fun and simple combat! You can dodge out of the way for a sword strike, you can pick up medkits along the way to keep your health (hopefully) maxed out so you can enter the kings quarters and eliminate the king to become the ruler! fight through multiple levels with fun gameplay! this game is inspired by the Shakespearian play called 'Macbeth'!

Story:

As Macbeth your goal is to travel across different locations to eliminate the guards and to eventually eliminate the king himself! All in hopes to take his crown and claim yourself as the ruler!
